Articles.Content:
Created by fiddling around in the SPH, the A-12 Meerkat is a twin boom jet inspired by the deHavilland Vampire. It's easy to fly and will get off the ground at around 50 m/s. The configuration of the fuel tanks keeps the center of mass in relatively the same area, and the docking port on the front allows refueling if you ever need it.

Pictures:

Instructions:

1- Turn on SAS

2- Throttle up and hit space

3- Pull up at around 50m/s

Action Groups:

1- Toggles the antennae at the ends of the wings.

This is my first post, so sorry if there's anything wrong. Please let me know about any problems and I'll fix it.
